  • 构造器详细资料

    • Bid

      public Bid​(Buyer buyer, float bidPrice, java.lang.String bidDate) throws BidException
      参数:
      buyer - Buyer type parameter
      bidPrice - float type - Bid price - unit is thousand
      bidDate - String type - date of creating bid
      抛出:
      BidException - When bid date yyyy--[1930-2021]; MM--[1-12]; dd--[legal for each month] or bid price(less than 0) is invalid, throw an exception message

  • 方法详细资料

    • setBidPrice

      public boolean setBidPrice​(float bidPrice)
      参数:
      bidPrice - float number - price of the bid
      返回:
      Boolean value -- to judge if the input parameter is valid

    • setBidDate

      public boolean setBidDate​(java.lang.String bidDate)
      参数:
      bidDate - The date of the bid created
      返回:
      Boolean value -- to judge if the input parameter(the date) is valid

      Getter methods

    • getBidPrice

      Getter methods
